verses.arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لِإِیلَـٰفِ قُرَیۡشٍ
verses.translation: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
Let them worship the Lord of this House,

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِیۤ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعࣲ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ
verses.translation: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
